node.doctext:
Yeah so like there hr was, just chilling on the streets like a stone cold pimp, and this fly ass honey saunters on by. So he says "Yo baby, you got some fries to go with that shake?" and sho' nuff she bent over right there and he tapped that ass.

(the previous one sided arguement of trollfinger has been removed since his troll ass can't hang no more. ps: your mother sucks cocks in hell)
node.title: perdedor turns on the charm
